titles.title: To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the performance of Federal Government in meeting certain small business procurement contracting goals, and for other purposes.

To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the performance of Federal Government in meeting certain small business procurement contracting goals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Contracting and Technology .

bill.summary: Directs the Comptroller General to study and report to Congress on the performance of the federal government in meeting goals for participation in federal procurement contracts by small businesses owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans and women.
